# NPPES {.unnumbered} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(provider) ``` ::: ## Individual Providers ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} nppes_npi(npi = 1710538772, tidy = FALSE) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 1 × 15 npi entype first_name last_name sole_proprietor gender enumeration_date 1 1710538772 NPI-1 YOLANDA A NICHOL… YES F 2019-09-21 # ℹ 8 more variables: last_updated , status , addresses , # taxonomy , identifiers , endpoints , # practice_locations , other_names ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} atl_ind <- provider::nppes_npi(entype = "I", state = "GA", city = "Atlanta", tidy = FALSE) atl_ind ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 200 × 20 npi entype first_name last_name sole_proprietor gender enumeration_date 1 17105387… NPI-1 YOLANDA A NICHOL… YES F 2019-09-21 2 13469910… NPI-1 MICHAEL AABERG NO M 2022-01-13 3 17504917… NPI-1 THOMAS AABERG YES M 2006-08-31 4 17407418… NPI-1 LAUREN AAMOTH YES F 2019-03-29 5 12658690… NPI-1 STEPHANIE AARDEMA YES F 2013-10-11 6 19928332… NPI-1 ALETA AARON YES F 2007-02-28 7 18818889… NPI-1 DEMETRIA AARON NO F 2007-08-31 8 16991392… NPI-1 HAYDEN AARON NO M 2016-04-11 9 15887755… NPI-1 MARIA AARON YES F 2006-08-31 10 17902524… NPI-1 REBECCA AARON NO F 2018-10-31 # ℹ 190 more rows # ℹ 13 more variables: last_updated , status , # certification_date , middle_name , credential , # name_prefix , name_suffix , addresses , taxonomy , # identifiers , endpoints , practice_locations , # other_names ``` ::: ::: Certification Date: NPPES allows providers to attest to the accuracy of their NPI data. When a provider requests any change to their NPI record, the certification date is updated. This may also effect the Last Updated column as well. ## Organizational Providers ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} atl_org <- provider::nppes_npi(entype = "O", state = "GA", city = "Atlanta", tidy = FALSE) atl_org ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 200 × 23 npi entype organization_name organizational_subpart enumeration_date 1 1881942746 NPI-2 1 ALLIANCE COUNSEL… NO 2012-08-27 2 1598140279 NPI-2 100 PERCENT CHIROP… NO 2015-07-23 3 1801411459 NPI-2 100 PERCENT CHIROP… NO 2020-06-10 4 1639793664 NPI-2 100 PERCENT CHIROP… NO 2020-06-05 5 1497497986 NPI-2 1230 ENTERPRISES NO 2022-04-13 6 1487827390 NPI-2 14TH STREET CHIROP… NO 2008-04-11 7 1265550859 NPI-2 180 RPM ENTERPRISE… NO 2007-03-26 8 1134508666 NPI-2 1ST ALLIANCE SURGI… NO 2015-05-29 9 1205284031 NPI-2 1ST CARE AMBULANCE… NO 2016-06-02 10 1598279655 NPI-2 1ST CHOICE DME SUP… NO 2017-11-28 # ℹ 190 more rows # ℹ 18 more variables: last_updated , status , # authorized_official_first_name , authorized_official_last_name , # authorized_official_telephone_number , # authorized_official_title_or_position , # authorized_official_name_prefix , # authorized_official_name_suffix , … ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} nppes_npi(1588375828) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 2 × 49 npi entype enumeration_date years_passed last_updated certification_date 1 15883758… Organ… 2022-12-07 0.62 2022-12-07 2022-12-07 2 15883758… Organ… 2022-12-07 0.62 2022-12-07 2022-12-07 # ℹ 43 more variables: status , organization_name , # organizational_subpart , purpose , street , city , # state , zipcode , country , phone_number , # authorized_official_first_name , authorized_official_last_name , # authorized_official_title_or_position , # authorized_official_telephone_number , tx_code , tx_desc , # tx_group , tx_state , tx_license , tx_primary , … ``` ::: ::: Identifiers are used to associate other provider identifiers such as Medicaid or other insurers (ie:, Blue Cross, Blue Shield, Aetna, Kaiser-Permanente, etc.), with their NPI number. These identifiers can be used in matching an NPI number to an insurer's records. However, not all providers have such numbers and not all providers choose to include them in their NPI information.
